name: Package Handler VR
description:
Hello and welcome to your new job at nutBox Co.! Since you're a beginner, you've been tasked with handling outgoing packages. Transmit the incoming packages to their respective outgoing conveyor belts. But be careful; too many false moves, and you're fired!

This game was originally a Global Game Jam 2018 submission. It has since been heavily tweaked and polished.

Credits

  • Christain Smith - Creative Lead
  • Alex Garbus - Programming Lead
  • Quinten Rader - Programming, Level Design, Voice Acting
  • Noah Bush - Modeling
  • Austin Dungan - Art & Audio
